mapper.insert: insert into kbc_t_exception_log (id, c_exception_json, c_exception_message, c_exception_create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exceptionJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, c_exception_json, c_exception_message, c_exception_create_time from kbc_t_exception_log
